content: how to knit baby spiral socks a step-by-step guide to knitting baby socks by heidi carter hello yarn friends let s make baby socks thank you for knitting my baby sock pattern there s always something fun about knitting up a little gift for a sweet little baby let s talk this is a one size pattern it is a cuff down sock this sock does not have a heal which makes it a great gift because it is more versatile for fitting baby i hope you enjoy knitting this pattern and that you make something you love i would love for you to share your project on instagram and tag me @heidis crafting corner and tag it with #heidiscraftingcorner happy making heidi needles & notions gaug e 24 sts for 4 inches in k2 p2 stitch with size us #5 knitting needles need l e s us size #5 or whatever size you need to fit gauge you will need double pointed needles i use 3 of the dpn to knit the socks you can watch video on youtube to see what i mean yarn dk weight yarn around 22 grams it does not take a lot of yarn size one size notions stitch marker yarn needle to weave in ends scissors to snip ends list of stitch abbreviations k knit p purl k2tog knit two stitches together ssk slip slip knit - slip 2 stitches knit wise one at a time then knit both together through the back loop st s - stitch es - repeat instructions inside brackets round s - round s dpn - double pointed knitting needles lets talk sizes i provide instructions for one size the beauty of knitting is you get the opportunity to personalize it to your own needs if you know the baby s feet are wider or narrower than the size i provide you can cast on more or less stitches the pattern is done in set s of 4 sts so if you are adding or removing stitches do it in sets of 4 sts cuff this will be joined in the round and i do that using 2 dpn i put 14 stitches on each needle and knit in the round from there i place a marker for the beginning of the round by attaching it to either the last stitch of the back needle or the first stitch of the front needle stitches i just leave it there for the remainder of knitting the sock cast on 28 stitches knit 6 rounds of 2x2 ribbing k2 p2 repeat to end leg & pattern rnds 1-2 p1 k2 p2 repeat to the last 3 sts k2 p1 rnds 3-4 p2 k2 repeat all the way around rnds 5-6 k1 p2 k2 repeat to the last 3 sts p2 k1 rnds 7-8 k2 p2 repeat all the way around you are back at the beginning of the pattern repeat rounds 1-8 until your desired length i did 40 rounds
